text: The employees are awesome. Good pizza. Stupid location and they are under a red lightup urgent care sign... They don't have a lit up sign... Very hard to find at night.

text: Abnormal behavior of workers. Either they were being robbed or they were high. Pretty sure they were high. Won't be going there again.

text: If I could rate this Papa Johns location zero stars I would. I placed a order for delivery and it took them over two hours to deliver the pizza and upon its arrival it was barely warm. I spoke with a manager who simply said that they were …More

text: I am disabled and PapaJohn's is the only one that delivers to my area.

name: Rico Spicuzza
text: An hour and a half to two hour delivery time. You get the pizza and it's Luke warm at best. Most of the time either missing toppings or they put so little on you have to search for them. Don't waste your time or money. Go somewhere else.

name: Leslie Blunt
text: Almost 2 hours to get my order and I live 5 minutes away.  When I called to verify my order, phone rang incessantly.  No one answered.  When they did, the guy  acted like he didnt know  what he was doing .

name: Pauline Jones
text: On Nov 9th  I placed an order over the phone for  garlic knots and a small pizza with green peppers and onions for DELIVERY.  The person who took my order told me it would be one (1) hour; I said "no problem".  In lest than 15 minutes a …More

text: It took them 2 hours from the time i ordered to the time it got to my door the pizza was slightly warm never again will i get my pizza from them.

name: Sarah Ford
text: Last time i ordered. Took 2 hours. Tonight they text me its on your way...its been an hour and still not here. I call and phone is busy. Next time it will be strike 3 and im done ever prdering again from this location. Worst service ive ever had by far.

name: Charles Perkins
text: 1 hour late. Called and the person answering was rude. They called back 45 minutes later to tell me the delivery driver had broken down and we're remaking my pizza. Unacceptable.

text: Don't eat here . Papa john pizza dunnellon constantly will mess up your orders and the people who cook your pizza will continually mess up your orders after your first complaint. Like literally they remember your name from computer and put a mark on your name to remind worker to mess your food every time u order from there.
